entry.title: Tim Drake: Boy Wonder
entry.summary:
Author: Pluviolo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,931Chapters: 1/3Kudos: 6

Summary: “I feel like we’re all connected by this… this grave injustice we have to endure. This unfairness that haunts us throughout our lives.” Tim was lying down. His head was dizzy with the knowledge that he was going to ruin his life tomorrow. And how, despite that, it was doing nothing to squash the small hope growing inside of him as he watched the clock count down. Or Tim is trans. And an idiot.

entry.title: Chasing Daylight
entry.summary:
Author: Masked_Cactus

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,516Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 167

Summary: Tim can handle only living as himself for the couple hours the world around him sleeps. Sure it sucks hiding his true self, but the safety is worth it. However, when Dick accidentally walks in on one of these hidden moments, he has other plans then letting Tim keep his secret. Or: Dick finds out Tim is trans and helps him with his transition albeit not without some panicking from them both

entry.title: You Look So Much Like Him(Your not him But you're all of what we've last left of him)
entry.summary:
Author: NOUFFE

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,939Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 201

Summary: ‘ If you're reading this it means I'm dead ‘ No greeting. No hello. Alfred froze, his heart stopped a moment before his eyes wide in panic and disbelief. Trying to see if it was probably some kind of joke that maybe it was forged but deep inside he knew all too well it isn't. ’ Listen, when I went on this search for Bruce in the time stream, I experienced hell. Something no one should ever survive. My body couldn't keep up, especially with something in me. ‘ Now that was enough to make Alfred's mind whirl in different scenarios. When he last saw the boy he was pale and thin when he returned Bruce back from the time stream and walked off the Manor never to be heard or seen again for months. He didn't want to overthink. Could it be? ’ You guessed it, that's a baby in the basket. Congrats. ‘   Or To where I switch up the TimKon Baby Fic, to a more Tim died giving birth and now the BatFam raises their last memory of their own, while dealing with the grief of loosing a family. Kon comes back alive to know the love of his life is dead and he has a son to raise without Tim.

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,532Chapters: 14/70Kudos: 330

entry.title: Tim Drake's Guardian Angel
entry.summary:
Author: n4tcrack3r

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,769Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 223

Summary: Someone is stalking Tim Drake.This would be worrisome, if Tim didn’t know who it was. If he didn’t know who it was, it would be someone smart enough to evade Red Robin, the Bat’s third partner who had wormed his way into the dangerous life of a vigilante, who had proven himself time and time again to be a threateningly intelligent and formidable enemy.But he knew who it was, so he wasn’t worried. He was terrified.Or: Tim Drake comes into (unwilling) contact with an old adversary and has to relive past (and present) trauma.

entry.title: i am just a fool (you are just a fool)
entry.summary:
Author: gothicmothh

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,514Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 62

Summary: Everything’s loud. His head is all fuzzy. Bad fuzzy. Not the good fuzz you get from being stoned out of your mind Tim always thought it was just weed and the occasional pill that gave him the good fuzz. But why does being around Kon give him that same feeling too? He feels better around Kon but once he’s away from him, everything feels so much worse. This isn’t healthy… Is it? ~ high school stoner timkon au where tim is a lot more reliant on kon then what is considered healthy.

entry.title: Young Justice Can Have a Little Evil As a Treat
entry.summary:
Author: Brownies96

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 61,040Chapters: 24/35Kudos: 1,200

Summary: Tim snorts, “Right. Obviously, that’s not the full story, but you were in space so we’re good.” He activates the tablet and shows Hal familiar paperwork. “I’ve come to the conclusion that if the League is going to treat me like I’m an unstable rogue, they’re going to have to commit to the bit.”After being treated like unwanted children all their lives, Tim, Kon, Cassie, and Bart start to realise that the adulthood set out before them isn't much better than the past their leaving behind. They decide it's time to make their own way in the world, even if it means being labelled as 'evil'
